name: CLOUD INFRASTRUCTURE SERVICES PROVIDERS IN EUROPE
goal: CISPE advocates for the creation of the cloud infrastructure single market to harness the power of IaaS and achieve Europe’s ambitious employment and growth goals.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Encourage “cloud first” public procurement policy initiatives with a “comply or explain” requirement when costlier onsite proprietary computing is preferred over cloud infrastructures

Promote coherent EU-wide security requirements and international technical security standards across all Member States

Support IaaS specific cloud privacy requirements, including through a privacy Code of Conduct for Infrastructure providers

Keep the EU cloud infrastructure market open, competitive and free from “lock-in” in single proprietary technologies or services

Ensure that the EU legal framework takes due account of the particular features of IaaS cloud computing
